name: Saigon Sun Hotel - Xa Dan
address: 241 Alley, Xa Dan Street, Dong Da District, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Dong Da District, Saigon Sun Hotel - Xa Dan is the perfect place to experience Hanoi and its surroundings. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. For sightseeing options and local attractions, one need not look far as the hotel enjoys close proximity to Jade Hanoi - Tailoring&Alteration, Mua Store, Vietnam Exhibition and Fair Centre.

The facilities and services provided by Saigon Sun Hotel - Xa Dan ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Top features of the hotel include free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, restaurant.

Step into one of 25 inviting rooms and escape the stresses of the day with a wide range of amenities such as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning which can be found in some rooms. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. When you are looking for comfortable and convenient accommodations in Hanoi, make Saigon Sun Hotel - Xa Dan your home away from home.
